notices.title: Power Outage
notices.body: There is a planned outage for myGarregMach scheduled from 1:40 am today.

notices.title: Fishing contest at 9am SHARP
notices.body: Flayn is hosting a fishing contest at 9am in the main entrance, please attend

notices.title: Hogwarts student exchange
notices.body: Hogwarts students are coming over for exchange! Please make all of them feel welcomed and safe members of the community

notices.title: New cafeteria dishes!
notices.body: Our chefs have been cooking up some new desserts, and we would like for you to try them out! Mango sago and Strawberry Sorbet are some new additions, get one free at the Cafeteria today!
